issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Should support "architecture" in EC2 DescribeInstances Response

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description:
Bundled, uploaded and registered a disk image to test HVM.  

{code}
$ euca-bundle-image -i Fedora-i386-20-Alpha-20130911-sda.raw -r i386
$ euca-upload-bundle -b Fedora-i386-hvm-v2 -m /var/tmp/bundle-AaLPju/Fedora-i386-20-Alpha-20130911-sda.raw.manifest.xml
$ euca-register -n Fedora-i386-HVM-v2 --virtualization-type hvm Fedora-i386-hvm-v2/Fedora-i386-20-Alpha-20130911-sda.raw.manifest.xml
$ euca-run-instances -k hspencer-admin -t m1.xlarge emi-9E56362E
RESERVATION  r-DA32433C	433405042008	default
INSTANCE	i-F2AF3CC3	emi-9E56362E	0.0.0.0	0.0.0.0	pending	hspencer-admin	0		m1.xlarge	2013-09-12T21:31:44.937Z	PARTI00	eki-AEA3390A			monitoring-disabled	0.0.0.0	0.0.0.0			instance-store
$ euca-describe-instances i-F2AF3CC3
RESERVATION  r-DA32433C	433405042008	default
INSTANCE	i-F2AF3CC3	emi-9E56362E	10.111.101.100	1.115.33.221	running	hspencer-admin	0		m1.xlarge	2013-09-12T21:31:44.937Z	PARTI00	eki-AEA3390			monitoring-disabled	10.111.101.100	1.115.33.221			instance-store
TAG	instance	i-F2AF3CC3	euca:node	10.111.5.12
{code}

Checked the XML file on the NC, and noticed that the XML contained "x86_64" for _arch_:

{code}
# virsh dumpxml i-F2AF3CC3
<domain type='kvm' id='2'>
  <name>i-F2AF3CC3</name>
  <uuid>d0064b46-6e36-940a-cdcf-1973c2ceb402</uuid>
  <description>Eucalyptus instance i-F2AF3CC3</description>
  <memory unit='KiB'>1048576</memory>
  <currentMemory unit='KiB'>1048576</currentMemory>
  <vcpu placement='static'>2</vcpu>
  <os>
    <type arch='x86_64' machine='rhel6.4.0'>hvm</type>
    <kernel>/disk1/storage/eucalyptus/instances/work/AID713YZPAZKECAS9GJF8/i-F2AF3CC3/link-to-kernel</kernel>
    <boot dev='hd'/>
  </os>
  <features>
    <acpi/>
  </features>
  <clock offset='localtime'/>
  <on_poweroff>destroy</on_poweroff>
  <on_reboot>restart</on_reboot>
  <on_crash>destroy</on_crash>
  <devices>
    <emulator>/usr/libexec/qemu-kvm</emulator>
    <disk type='block' device='disk'>
      <driver name='qemu' type='raw' cache='none'/>
      <source dev='/disk1/storage/eucalyptus/instances/work/AID713YZPAZKECAS9GJF8/i-F2AF3CC3/link-to-sda'/>
      <target dev='vda' bus='virtio'/>
      <alias name='virtio-disk0'/>
      <address type='pci' domain='0x0000' bus='0x00' slot='0x04' function='0x0'/>
    </disk>
    <disk type='block' device='disk'>
      <driver name='qemu' type='raw' cache='none'/>
      <source dev='/disk1/storage/eucalyptus/instances/work/AID713YZPAZKECAS9GJF8/i-F2AF3CC3/link-to-sdb'/>
      <target dev='vdb' bus='virtio'/>
      <alias name='virtio-disk1'/>
      <address type='pci' domain='0x0000' bus='0x00' slot='0x05' function='0x0'/>
    </disk>
    <controller type='usb' index='0'>
      <alias name='usb0'/>
      <address type='pci' domain='0x0000' bus='0x00' slot='0x01' function='0x2'/>
    </controller>
    <interface type='bridge'>
      <mac address='d0:0d:f2:af:3c:c3'/>
      <source bridge='eucabr543'/>
      <target dev='vnet0'/>
      <model type='virtio'/>
      <alias name='net0'/>
      <address type='pci' domain='0x0000' bus='0x00' slot='0x03' function='0x0'/>
    </interface>
    <serial type='file'>
      <source path='/disk1/storage/eucalyptus/instances/work/AID713YZPAZKECAS9GJF8/i-F2AF3CC3/console.log'/>
      <target port='1'/>
      <alias name='serial0'/>
    </serial>
    <console type='file'>
      <source path='/disk1/storage/eucalyptus/instances/work/AID713YZPAZKECAS9GJF8/i-F2AF3CC3/console.log'/>
      <target type='serial' port='1'/>
      <alias name='serial0'/>
    </console>
    <memballoon model='virtio'>
      <alias name='balloon0'/>
      <address type='pci' domain='0x0000' bus='0x00' slot='0x06' function='0x0'/>
    </memballoon>
  </devices>
  <seclabel type='none'/>
</domain>
{code}

Looking at the NC log, it looks like something is hardcoded since nothing is passed via doRunInstance:

{code}
# grep i-F2AF3CC3 /var/log/eucalyptus/nc.log
2013-09-12 14:31:45  INFO 000026909 doRunInstance            | [i-F2AF3CC3] running instance cores=2 disk=10 memory=1024 vlan=543 net=13 priMAC=D0:0D:F2:AF:3C:C3 privIp=1.115.33.221 plat=linux kernel=(null) ramdisk=(null)
